name: Mysterious Fall
description: The character spawns in a new strange world where there’s only pain and cruelty. With their dog by their side, they get attacked by unrealistic monsters and the dog gets taken away and the character gets left behind. The player’s main objective is to rescue the dog back. However, there’s obstacles in the way and the character needs to find a path that leads to the dog without getting caught by the monsters. One mistake could mean the end of the game.
